Alice emphasized the significance of the event and its emotional resonance, while Bob pointed to the commonality of crowd interactions at music festivals. Neither side utilized specific supporting evidence effectively.

THE TRUTH: True; Jay-Z did lead a crowd in singing "Happy Birthday" to Beyoncé at the Budweiser Made in America festival on September 4, 2017, marking her 36th birthday.
